title: Flows of vector fields and the Kalman Theorem
authors: Fabio Bagagiolo, Cristina Giannotti, Andrea Spiro and Marta Zoppello
abstract:
We investigate the relations between the Kalman Theorem and the
Chow-Rashevskji Theorem or, more precisely, the general theory of flows tangent
to non-integrable distributions. The main results consist of two proofs of the
Kalman Theorem, which are alternative to the most common ones and which
enlighten the above relations and stimulate generalisations in various
directions.
